text: His Strongest Weapon () is a 1928 German silent thriller film directed by Harry Piel and starring Piel, Vera Schmiterlöw and Philipp Manning. The film's sets were designed by the art director Willi Herrmann. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1928 films Category:1920s action thriller films Category:German action thriller films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Harry Piel Category:UFA films
title: His Strongest Weapon
